metadata.title: CVE-2021-30818 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, tvOS 15, iOS 15 and iPadOS 15,Safari 15, watchOS 8. Processing maliciously crafted web content may leadto arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
